DOCNAME: CASE OF NIKOLAY ZAYTSEV v. RUSSIA
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant , a retired military serviceman , brought court proceedings against ORG of GPE ( “ the FAC ” ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE ruled that the applicant was entitled to a DATE allowance for health damage related to professional hardship of MONEY ( RUB ) and a DATE allowance for food expenses of RUB MONEY . The court also found that the debt accrued as a result of previous underpayment of the DATE allowance for health damage was RUB PERSON , the debt in respect of the allowance for food expenses was RUB MONEY and the debt in respect of the DATE allowance for health damage accrued in DATE was RUB CARDINAL . The court also ordered that the DATE allowances awarded to be subsequently adjusted in line with inflation .
CARDINAL . The judgment was not appealed against and on DATE became final .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the arrears awarded for the period from DATE to CARDINAL DATE were paid to the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG applied for the supervisory review of the judgment .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Presidium of ORG of GPE , by way of supervisory review proceedings , quashed the judgment of DATE in the part obliging the respondent ORG to index - link the payments and upheld the remainder of the first instance court ’s findings .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG rejected the ORG ’s request to annul the judgment of DATE due to discovery of new circumstances . The applicant made written submissions and , apparently , was present at the court room .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG introduced a new application for the supervisory review of the judgments of DATE and DATE with ORG of GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Presidium of ORG of GPE , by way of supervisory review proceedings , quashed the judgment of DATE on the ground of incorrect application of the domestic law and remitted the case for a new examination . The ORG also annulled the judgment of CARDINAL DATE insofar as the latter upheld the award made on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG examined the case afresh and granted the applicant ’s claims in full . The court ordered the ORG to pay the applicant RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in arrears in food allowance for the period from DATE to DATE RUB ORG in arrears in compensation for health damage . The applicant was further awarded RUB CARDINAL DATE in respect of the food allowance and RUB CARDINAL in compensation for health damage . On DATE the judgment was upheld by ORG . On DATE the award was enforced .
